nodes.text: A statue of IG-11 was erected on the planet Nevarro to commemorate the reprogrammed assassin droid IG-11's sacrifice to save Grogu, Din Djarin, Carasynthia Dune, and Greef Karga, and also to aid the liberation of Nevarro from Gideon's Imperial remnant around 9 ABY[source?] during the skirmish on Nevarro.
It was located in the market place of Nevarro city, near the entrance to the school.
